name: Bana Simulator Alpha
description:
Become the last Bana on a quest to save the world! Meet new friends, take down vicious foes! Explore the vast world of Bana Simulator! In this top-down action-rpg you will team up with Apple and the Alchemist to explore the world, destroy your foes, collect weapons, and so much more!! Alternatively you could try the endless mode gauntlet and see how far you can get!

Notice: This game is in early access, we have many planned updates down the road and before long there will be new game modes, over one-hundred planned levels, at least ten new bosses, dozens of weapons, countless new game mechanics and enemies, and so much more to look forward to! Those who join us in beta will get unique rewards when we fully release for being supportive of Bana Simulator, so don't hesitate to get the game now and be a part of this epic journey!
